text: The 2007 LPGA Championship was played from June 7–10 at Bulle Rock Golf Course in Havre de Grace, Maryland. This was the 53rd edition of the LPGA Championship, the second of four major championships on the LPGA Tour in 2007. Suzann Pettersen, age 26, won her first major title with 274 (−14), one stroke ahead of runner-up Karrie Webb; it was her second career win on the LPGA Tour. ==Past champions in the field== ===Made the cut=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Player || Country || Year(s) won || R1 || R2 || R3 || R4 || Total || To par || Finish |- | align=left|Karrie Webb || align=left| || 2001 || 68 || 69 || 71 || 67 || 275 || −13 || 2 |- | align=left|Annika Sörenstam || align=left| || 2003, 2004, 2005 || 70 || 69 || 73 || 71 || 283 || −5 || T15 |- | align=left|Juli Inkster || align=left| || 1999, 2000 || 73 || 73 || 73 || 66 || 285 || −3 || T21 |- | align=left|Laura Davies || align=left| || 1994, 1996 || 68 || 75 || 71 || 73 || 287 || +2 || T30 |- | align=left|Se Ri Pak || align=left| || 1998, 2002, 2006 || 73 || 70 || 74 || 71 || 288 || E || T33 |- | align=left|Sherri Turner || align=left| || 1988 || 71 || 73 || 74 || 72 || 290 || +2 || T41 |- |} Source: ===Missed the cut=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Player || Country || Year(s) won || R1 || R2 || Total || To par |- | align=left|Beth Daniel || align=left| || 1990 || 71 || 78 || 149 || +5 |- | align=left|Meg Mallon || align=left| || 1991 || 77 || 73 || 150 || +6 |- | align=left|Kelly Robbins || align=left| || 1995 || 78 || 72 || 150 || +6 |- | align=left|Christa Johnson || align=left| || 1997 || 76 || 79 || 155 || +11 |- | align=left|Nancy Lopez || align=left| || 1978, 1985, 1989 || 83 || 78 || 161 || +17 |} Source: == Round summaries == === First round=== Thursday, June 7, 2007 {| class="wikitable" !
